Projects.title: Audial Atlas
modal-description: This is a group project and a school assignment to develop a music API. We had tons of fun developing this and it gave us all new insights of API Development in general.

We followed the design of repository pattern, with focus on the concept of IoC. We have repositories that fetches data from the database, and sends it to our Handlers. Our Handlers then give an IResult based on result back to endpoint.
We use DTOs to send data via calls, and ViewModels to return limited designed data back.

Projects.title: Interests API
modal-description: This was my first API. It's built using ASP.NET Core with Minimal API, implementing RESTful architecture.
The API is managing viewing and storing people, their interests and corresponding links using HTTP verbs.

Projects.title: BankNyBank
modal-description: BankNyBank (BankNewBank) is a console app built in C# that emulates a simple bank-app/ATM.
The program was a school group project.
